span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是继承自一个专用的区域类类，并提供一组基本的行为的派生区域包含控件。The class is a specialized zone class that inherits from the class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls. 有几个其他类型的类; 有关详细信息，请参阅概述主题面向类。There are several other types of classes; for more information, see the overview topic for the class. 其他工具和区域一样，页处于正常浏览模式时，区域不可见; 仅当页面处于编辑显示模式时才它们是可见的。Like other tool zones, zones are not visible when a page is in normal browse mode; they are visible only when a page is in edit display mode. 也喜欢其他工具区域，区域只能包含它们被设计为包含的控件的特殊类型 (在这种情况下，控件)。Also like the other tool zones, zones can only contain the special type of controls they were designed to contain (in this case, controls). 区域为它们包含的编辑控件提供一个特殊的用户界面。The zones provide a special UI for the editing controls they contain. 许多这些 UI 元素是通用的 Web 部件控件集内的所有区域。Many of these UI elements are common to all zones in the Web Parts control set. Web 部件区域中的常见 UI 元素的详细讨论，请参阅类概述主题面向类。For a detailed discussion of the common UI elements in Web Parts zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 因为类为抽象类，不能直接在网页上使用它。Because the class is abstract, you cannot use it directly on a Web page. 相反，你必须使用继承自的控件类并实现其行为。Instead, you must use a control that inherits from the class and implements its behavior. 你可以使用 Web 部件控件集中, 提供的派生的区域控件，或者可以派生自己的自定义控件。You can either use the derived zone that is provided in the Web Parts control set, the control, or you can derive your own custom control. 类提供的常见用户界面 (UI) 来包含特殊的控件，使最终用户能够编辑属性、 布局和外观和的其他特性控件。The class provides a common user interface (UI) to contain special controls that enable end users to edit the properties, layout, appearance, and other attributes of controls. 某些属性应用于 UI 指的谓词，如， ，和属性。Some properties that apply to the UI refer to verbs, such as the , , and properties. 谓词是由用户在页面上，执行的常见操作和由按钮、 链接、 菜单项或其他元素表示用户界面中。Verbs are common actions carried out by users on a page, and are represented in the UI by buttons, links, menu items, or other elements. 例如，当用户编辑控件上的属性时则可以单击应用谓词来保存所做的更改。For example, when users edit properties on a control they can click an apply verb to save the changes. 多个其他属性会影响显示在编辑 UI 中的各个点的文本。Several other properties affect text that is displayed at various points in the editing UI. 其中包括， ， ，和属性。These include the , , , and properties. 两个重要属性提供对相关控件的引用。Two important properties provide references to related controls. 属性是集合的该区域中包含的控件。The property is a collection of the controls contained in the zone. 属性是对控件中包含的对象引用-这可能有点控件或任何其他 ASP.NET 服务器控件、 用户控件或当前正在编辑的自定义控件。The property is an object reference to a control contained in a --which might be a control or any other ASP.NET server control, user control, or custom control currently being edited. 最后，属性引用的实例对象与该区域，该键相关联且包含的外围 UI 元素 （称为 chrome） 例如标题和边框样式的样式特征该区域中的控件。Finally, the property references an instance of an object that is associated with the zone, and that contains style characteristics of the peripheral UI elements (known as chrome) such as title and border styles for controls in the zone. 大量的方法类专门用于处理其他控件的编辑。A number of the methods of the class are specialized to handle the editing of other controls. 方法可更改编辑显示模式回正常浏览视图的页。The method changes the page from the edit display mode back to a normal browsing view. 方法对于创建 chrome （即外围 UI 元素，如边框、 谓词、 图标和标题） 环绕每个是区域中的控件。The method is for creating the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone. 方法是一个抽象方法; 派生的类重写它创建的所有实例该区域中包含的控件。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 如果，可以由派生类调用方法的集合中某种编程的原因，标志的 Web and update the collection of controls. 方法用于设置的集合控件添加到`null`时编辑模式中的显示模式更改回浏览模式。The method is used to set the collection of controls to `null` when the display mode changes from edit mode back to browse mode. 最后，方法用于处理事件时控制进入或离开编辑模式。Finally, the method is used for handling the event when a control is either entering or leaving edit mode. 例如，此方法是同步的属性值的方便位置中关联的可编辑值的控件控件。For example, this method is a convenient place to synchronize the property values of a control with the editable values in the associated controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示几个声明性和以编程方式使用类。The following code example demonstrates para.span: 如果你想要开发一个自定义区域，以便承载控件，你必须确定你是否想要提供区域模板支持。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 通过实现的类型创建了一个区域模板接口，并且如果你想要启用使用自定义区域以引用的页开发人员是必需的网页的声明性标记该区域内的控件。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果您需要区域模板支持，你应继承自类。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 与此相反，如果你自定义的区域并将其控件会成为自包含，并将不使用任何页开发人员在区域模板中，以声明方式指定控件的选项以编程方式创建它们，然后你可以直接继承从类。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果这样做，是关键是要实现方法，以便你的自定义时区将起作用。

span.span: If you do this, it is critical that you implement the method so that your custom zone will work.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用谓词引用的控件上的属性派生自类。The apply verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 应用谓词保存到服务器控件当前正在编辑的编辑最终用户已编辑的用户界面 (UI) 中的更改。The apply verb saves editing changes that an end user has made in the editing user interface (UI) to a server control that is currently being edited. 默认情况下，应用谓词将出现在 UI 作为控件。By default, the apply verb appears in the UI as a control. 按钮的类型可以是图像、 一个链接或实际的按钮;你可以设置这谓词的所有按钮在区域中 （而不是为各个按钮） 通过设置继承在区域级别的属性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 应用谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着尽管可能存在多个控件，每个编辑处于编辑模式的服务器控件的一个或多个属性应用谓词发挥普遍从所有应用所有更改到服务器控件区域中的控件。The apply verb is a zone-level control, which means that although there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the apply verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone to the server control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问属性同时以声明方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 下面的代码示例的第一部分演示如何访问以声明方式在网页中的属性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 此示例自定义谓词的文本。This example customizes the text for the verb.
